General.Name: Shenzhen Feima International Supply Chain Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Feima International Supply Chain Co., Ltd. engages in the supply chain management and environmental protection new energy businesses in China and internationally. It offers coal procurement, logistics, warehousing, and distribution services to coal end users, as well as coal resources; settlement; import and export customs clearance, and procurement and sales execution services; and enterprises or government overseas contracting and foreign aid services, as well as operates a non-ferrous metal e-commerce platform. The company is also involved in the enterprise logistics outsourcing projects; procurement of large-scale special-shaped equipment; straw and garbage power generation, and solid waste renewable resources treatment and utilization business; and industrial park construction, as well as IT electronics business. In addition, it engages in general trading and investment business; and provision of IoT technical services. Shenzhen Feima International Supply Chain Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.
